snippet: Not long after Mayor Edwin Lee of San Francisco is sworn in, there will be a fund-raiser to retire his campaign debt, an event that has become standard in post-election politics.
lead_paragraph: Not long after Mayor Edwin Lee of San Francisco is sworn in, there will be a fund-raiser to retire his campaign debt, an event that has become standard in post-election politics.

headline.seo: Fund-Raiser for Mayor Lee of San Francisco Aims to Retire Campaign Debt
headline.main: It’s Time to Retire Lee’s Debt
headline.print_headline: It’s Time To Retire Lee’s Debt
